tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE satellite_altitude_changes (
    satellite_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    altitude FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE altitude_changes (change_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    satellite_id INT,
    change_date DATE,
    change_amount FLOAT);

CREATE TABLE aggregated_reports (satellite_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    average_altitude FLOAT,
    max_altitude FLOAT,
    min_altitude FLOAT);

CREATE TABLE ReportGeneration (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_name VARCHAR(255),
  report_date DATE,
  generated_by VARCHAR(255),
  generated_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Reports (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id INT REFERENCES ReportGeneration(id),
  satellite_id INT REFERENCES Satellites(id),
  min_altitude FLOAT,
  max_altitude FLOAT
);
